entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character in the story who is speaking to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who is having a conversation with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a powerful wizard that Harry is being compared to.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: The thestral is described as a great skeletal animal in the yard.

relationships.description: Harry is being compared to Voldemort by Mr. Weasley, implying that Harry has power similar to Voldemort's.
Mr. Weasley and Harry are having a conversation about magic and power.
Harry is physically close to the thestral in the dark yard.
